name: graph-paths
description: Finding shortest / cheapest paths in a dense graph

0.1.0.name: graph-paths
0.1.0.description: Finding shortest / cheapest paths in a dense graph
0.1.0.readme:
graph-paths
===========

Finding cheapest (shortest) paths in a dense graph (network).

The graph is given by a matrix of direct costs between each two nodes in the network.  

See example.js for an example.
